summary: All 6 requirements (REQ-28 through REQ-33) have been fully implemented. The diff shows that text color classes have been systematically changed from black/gray variants (text-black, text-gray-900, text-gray-800) to white (text-white) across all specified files: LandingPage.tsx, StudentDashboard.tsx, IndustryDashboard.tsx, AdminDashboard.tsx, AISkillMapping.tsx, and RoleSelectionModal.tsx. All headings, descriptions, labels, navigation items, and body text now display in white as requested.
